item.title: Custom Rotten Potato [PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

Hi so today i am gong to show you how to add my Custom Rotten potato

Credits:
97% to Valour for the idea and the sprites http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/412242-pi-command-control-interface-pi.html
3% to me for the code and 3 other Interface

So first of all go into ItemDef.java

And copy and paste this code

case 5733: itemDef.name = "Rotten Potato"; itemDef.description = "A Rotten Potato"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[3] = "Open Main Menu"; break;

Now go to RsInterface.java

And add this

[code]public static void ModControls(RSFont[] TDA) {
RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(37000);
RSInterface scroll = addTabInterface(37002);
addSprite(37001, 0, “staff/backdrop”);
//information box and title
addText(37080, “Mod Commands”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //Title
addText(37081, “This is just for Mods and Upwards”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //Information
addText(37082, “If U Abuse You will get Demoted”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //Information
addText(37083, " ~Thank You for Your loytaly~ ", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //Information
tab.totalChildren(6);
//Interface
tab.child(0, 37001, 0, 0);
tab.child(1, 37002, -147, 80);
tab.child(2, 37080, 23, 20);
tab.child(3, 37081, 243, 157);
tab.child(4, 37082, 243, 187);
tab.child(5, 37083, 243, 217);
//information box and title start

		//information box and title end
		scroll.width = 312;//312
		scroll.height = 248;//248
		scroll.scrollMax = 785;//735
	
		//buttons themself, in order
		addButton(37011, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Lock Account", 1);
		addButton(37012, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Kick Player", 1);
		addButton(37013, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Mute Player", 1);
		addButton(37014, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Jail Player", 1);
		addButton(37015, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Un-Mute", 1);
		addButton(37016, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Un-Ban", 1);
		addButton(37017, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Un-Jail", 1);
		addButton(37018, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Check Bank", 1);
		addButton(37019, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Check Inv", 1);
		addButton(37020, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "StaffZone", 1);
		addButton(37021, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Turn To Npc", 1);
		addButton(37022, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Open My Bank", 1);
		addButton(37023, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Teleport To", 1);
		addButton(37024, 0, "Staffl/mod", 116, 26, "Tele To Me", 1);
		addButton(37025, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(37026, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(37027, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(37028, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(37029, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(37030, 0, "Staff/mod", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		
		//buttons text, in order
		addText(37050, "Lock", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37051, "Kick", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37052, "Mute", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37053, "Jail", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37054, "Un-Mute", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37055, "Un-Ban", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37056, "Un-Jail", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37057, "Check Bank", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37058, "Check Inv", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37059, "Staffzone", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37060, "Turn To npc", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37061, "Open My Bank", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37062, "Teleport To", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37063, "Tele To Me", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37064, "", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37065, "", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(37066, "", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		
		scroll.totalChildren(37); 
		//buttons and text start
		scroll.child(0, 37011, 177, 8);
		scroll.child(1, 37012, 177, 47);
		scroll.child(2, 37013, 177, 85);
		scroll.child(3, 37014, 177, 123);
		scroll.child(4, 37015, 177, 161);
		scroll.child(5, 37016, 177, 199);
		scroll.child(6, 37017, 177, 237);
		scroll.child(7, 37018, 177, 275);
		scroll.child(8, 37019, 177, 313);
		scroll.child(9, 37020, 177, 351);
		scroll.child(10, 37021, 177, 389);
		scroll.child(11, 37022, 177, 427);
		scroll.child(12, 37023, 177, 465);
		scroll.child(13, 37024, 177, 503);
		scroll.child(14, 37025, 177, 541);
		scroll.child(15, 37026, 177, 579);
		scroll.child(16, 37027, 177, 617);
		scroll.child(17, 37028, 177, 655);
		scroll.child(18, 37029, 177, 693);
		scroll.child(19, 37030, 177, 731);
		scroll.child(20, 37050, 203, 15);
		scroll.child(21, 37051, 203, 54);
		scroll.child(22, 37052, 203, 92);
		scroll.child(23, 37053, 203, 130);
		scroll.child(24, 37054, 203, 168);
		scroll.child(25, 37055, 203, 207);
		scroll.child(26, 37056, 203, 245);
		scroll.child(27, 37057, 203, 282);
		scroll.child(28, 37058, 203, 321);
		scroll.child(29, 37059, 203, 359);
		scroll.child(30, 37060, 203, 397);
		scroll.child(31, 37061, 203, 435);
		scroll.child(32, 37062, 203, 473);
		scroll.child(33, 37063, 203, 511);
		scroll.child(34, 37064, 203, 550);
		scroll.child(35, 37065, 203, 588);
		scroll.child(36, 37066, 203, 625);
		//buttons and text end
	}
	
			public static void MainStaff(RSFont[] TDA) {
    RSInterface Interface = addInterface(27780);
    addSprite(27781, 0, "Staff/BACKGROUND");
    addHoverButton(27782, "Staff/SPRITE", 0, 26, 26, "Close", 250, 27782, 3);
	AddInterfaceButton(27783, 1, "Staff/mod", 80, 20, "Mod Options", 1);
    AddInterfaceButton(27784, 1, "Staff/admin", 80, 20, "Admin Options", 1);
    setChildren(4, Interface);
    setBounds(27781, 140, 26, 0, Interface); 
    setBounds(27782, 444, 44, 1, Interface);
	setBounds(27783, 240, 87, 2, Interface);
	setBounds(27784, 240, 121, 3, Interface);
    }
	
	public static void AdminControls(RSFont[] TDA) {
		RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(38000);
		RSInterface scroll = addTabInterface(38002);
		addSprite(38001, 1, "staff/backdrop");
		//information box and title 
		addText(38080, "Admin Commands", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //Title
		addText(38081, "This is just for Mods and Upwards", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //Information
		addText(38082, "If U Abuse You will get Demoted", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //Information
		addText(38083, "    ~Thank You for Your loytaly~  ", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); //Information
		tab.totalChildren(6);
		//Interface
		tab.child(0, 38001, 0, 0);
		tab.child(1, 38002, -147, 80);
		tab.child(2, 38080, 23, 20);
		tab.child(3, 38081, 243, 157);
		tab.child(4, 38082, 243, 187);
		tab.child(5, 38083, 243, 217);
		//information box and title start
		
		//information box and title end
		scroll.width = 312;//312
		scroll.height = 248;//248
		scroll.scrollMax = 785;//735
	
		//buttons themself, in order
		addButton(38011, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Ip-Ban", 1);
		addButton(38012, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Un-Ip-Ban", 1);
		addButton(38013, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Ip-Mute", 1);
		addButton(38014, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Un-ip-Mute", 1);
		addButton(38015, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Un-Mute", 1);
		addButton(38016, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Un-Ban", 1);
		addButton(38017, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "God Mode", 1);
		addButton(38018, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Alert", 1);
		addButton(38019, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Interface", 1);
		addButton(38020, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Teleport", 1);
		addButton(38021, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Spawn Item", 1);
		addButton(38022, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Spawn Npc", 1);
		addButton(38023, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Spawn object", 1);
		addButton(38024, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Demote", 1);
		addButton(38025, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(38026, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(38027, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(38028, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(38029, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		addButton(38030, 0, "Staff/admin", 116, 26, "Coming Soon!", 1);
		
		//buttons text, in order
		addText(38050, "Ip-Ban", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38051, "Un-Ip-Ban", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38052, "Ip-Mute", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38053, "Un-Ip-Mute", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38054, "Un-Mute", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38055, "Un-Ban", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38056, "God Mode", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38057, "Alert", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38058, "Interface", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38059, "Teleport", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38060, "Spawn Item", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38061, "Spawn Npc", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38062, "Spawn Object", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38063, "Demote", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38064, "", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38065, "", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addText(38066, "", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		
		scroll.totalChildren(37); 
		//buttons and text start
		scroll.child(0, 38011, 177, 8);
		scroll.child(1, 38012, 177, 47);
		scroll.child(2, 38013, 177, 85);
		scroll.child(3, 38014, 177, 123);
		scroll.child(4, 38015, 177, 161);
		scroll.child(5, 38016, 177, 199);
		scroll.child(6, 38017, 177, 237);
		scroll.child(7, 38018, 177, 275);
		scroll.child(8, 38019, 177, 313);
		scroll.child(9, 38020, 177, 351);
		scroll.child(10, 38021, 177, 389);
		scroll.child(11, 38022, 177, 427);
		scroll.child(12, 38023, 177, 465);
		scroll.child(13, 38024, 177, 503);
		scroll.child(14, 38025, 177, 541);
		scroll.child(15, 38026, 177, 579);
		scroll.child(16, 38027, 177, 617);
		scroll.child(17, 38028, 177, 655);
		scroll.child(18, 38029, 177, 693);
		scroll.child(19, 38030, 177, 731);
		scroll.child(20, 38050, 203, 15);
		scroll.child(21, 38051, 203, 54);
		scroll.child(22, 38052, 203, 92);
		scroll.child(23, 38053, 203, 130);
		scroll.child(24, 38054, 203, 168);
		scroll.child(25, 38055, 203, 207);
		scroll.child(26, 38056, 203, 245);
		scroll.child(27, 38057, 203, 282);
		scroll.child(28, 38058, 203, 321);
		scroll.child(29, 38059, 203, 359);
		scroll.child(30, 38060, 203, 397);
		scroll.child(31, 38061, 203, 435);
		scroll.child(32, 38062, 203, 473);
		scroll.child(33, 38063, 203, 511);
		scroll.child(34, 38064, 203, 550);
		scroll.child(35, 38065, 203, 588);
		scroll.child(36, 38066, 203, 625);
		//buttons and text end
	}[/code]

Now Look for aclass44

And add this ModControls(rsFonts); AdminControls(rsFonts); MainStaff(rsFonts);

OK thats it for the Client now add these Sprites

http://up.ht/Xt5OC5

So now for server Part

Go to ItemClick3.java

And add this case 5733: c.getPA().showInterface(27780); break;

So now to make it so other players carnt get it

Go to Config.java and add ,5733 at the end of undropable and tradeable and the rest

Now go to Clicking Buttons and add

case 108135: c.getPA().showInterface(37000); break; case 108136: c.getPA().showInterface(38000); break;

Now for some Pics

Now thats it all you have to o is make the commands work i would help but i cant do it yet :[ if you would like to help post here or go tot he forum http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,624945.msg4255322.html#new

Read full topic
